text: It’s maddening to think of all the resources it takes to make the desert of Arizona widely habitable only to be a home for raisin brained epic poly sex nerds, cops with tanks, and wook artists who make 1,000,000,000 for a painting of an alien eating pizza https://t.co/La1HtRHwCs
Kyrsten Sinema, the Senate’s most colorful member, posts a pic of herself on instagram rocking a “F*** Off” ring & sipping what looks like Sangria https://t.co/ec6AkEPUiE
